name: jp-weld
description: jp-weld is a miniature web compiler, allowing a component based web app architecture.

scripts.jsdev: npx nodemon --ignore src/ --ignore dist/ --ignore ts/ --verbose --delay 2.5 weld.js -- dev
scripts.jsdevbuild: npx nodemon --ignore src/ --ignore dist/ --ignore ts/ --verbose --delay 2.5 weld.js -- build
